titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 3393) to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to consolidate certain tax benefits for educational expenses, and for other purposes, and providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 4935) to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to make improvements to the child tax credit.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 113-552, by Mr. Cole.
The rule provides for the consideration of H.R. 3393 and H.R. 4935 under a closed rules.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 128.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 680.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 226 - 191 (Roll no. 442).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 226 - 189 (Roll no. 443).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 7/23/2014--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for consideration of the bill (H.R. 3393) to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to consolidate certain tax benefits for educational expenses, and for other purposes, and providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 4935) to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to make improvements to the child tax credit.
